1.0.name: wordpress/smart-tribune-addsnippet
1.0.description:
A module that allows admins to easily insert Smart Tribune snippet into their website/application. It is used to inject Smart Tribune code snippet just before body end tag which is the recommended placement for Smart Tribune snippet.

Smart Tribune is a brand new SaaS software that let you personalize your online customer relationship. This module will help Website admin to integrate as easily as possible snippet into their website.

To learn more about Smart Tribune, feel free to visit our website Smart Tribune
